section.name: Avalon Documentation
section.p: Avalon documentation can be found in the following locations:

tr.td: The Avalon section of the Apache Wiki site. Feel free to contribute!
Links to online articles, white papers, and tutorials.
Each individual product or sub-project has its own section which includes API documentation (javadocs), general information, and often simple tutorials.
The mailing list archives are full of tips, examples, solutions, and explanations about Avalon.
